Uses of Interface
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context.InfinitumContext

  • Packages that use InfinitumContext 
    Package Description
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the AOP framework.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context
    Provides the classes necessary for configuring Infinitum and providing application-wide access to configuration information.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the context framework.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di
    Provides the classes necessary for performing dependency injection.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the DI framework.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.internal
    Provides internal utility classes.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.logging
    Provides classes pertaining to the logging framework.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.logging.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the logging framework.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm
    Provides the classes necessary for the Infinitum ORM.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence
    Provides the classes necessary for mapping and persisting data between domain objects and database tables.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the persistence framework.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite
    Provides the classes necessary for SQLite object-relational mapping.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the SQLite ORM framework.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.rest
    Provides the classes necessary for communicating with RESTful web services.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.rest.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the RESTful client framework.
